description:
Yuu and Misa are fully enjoying the gifts of summer at the ocean.
On the other hand, Jun is in the library working on her summer homework because she`s too embarrassed to wear her bathing suit. 
Jun`s agonizing about the report she`s supposed to write about her future career when she happens to meet Koizumi-san and asks her about her aspirations.
What could Koizumi-san`s dream be?
Source: crunchyroll
